ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] bards in guilds...
ygData.msgSnippet: Paradigm has 5 bards I believe, all 55+ and of course they all rock :) However, every one of them laughs at me for playing Tani.  The other day, I told one
ygData.messageBody:
Paradigm has 5 bards I believe, all 55+ and of course they all rock :)

However, every one of them laughs at me for playing Tani. The other day, I
told one "Hey, I just learned something about Bard-dom".. she replies,
"What? That you should quit now?" Found it kind of funny... but seriously,
they mostly complain aobut their hands being tired from twisting hehe.

Halana, 56th eternally (damn these quests) Shaman
Tani, 29th Bardette

> -----Original Message-----
> From: James Schuldes [mailto:jgs@...]
> Sent: Thursday, October 12, 2000 11:35 AM
> To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] bards in guilds...
>
>
> 3 50+ active bards: Me, just made 54. Suladan 55 still plays his bard
> pretty much. Kaldivar 53 not really enjoying high level life
> (hard to get
> good groups, exp so slow, etc. etc.) so he has been leveling
> up a warrior
> and playing other classes.
>
> Lately, I have been playing 52 Cleric and 51 Enchanter.
> Learning these
> other classes is more interesting to me at the moment. Also,
> I have 2 PC's
> now and spend a fair amount of time driving 2 chars.
>
> Sylly
>
> > Just a quick question. How many bards above 30 are there in
> your guilds?
>
>
